name: Galaxi Barkonid
overview: Galaxi Barkonid is a graphically improved update of the 1986 version entitled Barkonid. The gameplay is similar to Arkanoid and Breakout. There are over 100 levels and a final assembly. The game can be played with a joystick or gamepad. The player can pick up bonus capsules that contain various positive or negative extras. These bonuses have to be taken with the ball and not just with the board to be absorbed. Examples include a laser, extra lives, level jumps, glue and much more.
